column4: I am finding no answers as of yet as to why my 8139too based smc2-1211tx nic can ping both internal and extrenal addresses as well as dns external names but can not telnet/http/irc anything..... any help?
have you definitely ruled out your router/modem?
not sure how to specificly do that but my other systems are using the same router/modem
how would i definitely rule out my router/modem?
